user_query: I'm organizing a company event and need some icebreaker jokes. Can you suggest some chuck jokes that can lighten the atmosphere? Also, find a playlist of popular tracks on Deezer to play during the event. Additionally, calculate the love percentage between two randomly selected colleagues using the Love Calculator API.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of chuck jokes to use as icebreakers during the event.
Retrieve a popular playlist from Deezer suitable for the event.
Calculate the love percentage between two randomly selected colleagues using the Love Calculator API.
